// src/context/characterContext.jsx
import create from'zustand';export const useCharacter=create(set=>({character:{// Concept
name:'',player:'',culture:'',career:'',// Attributes
STR:0,CON:0,DEX:0,POW:0,CHA:0,INT:0,SIZ:0,// Skills
cultAlloc:{},careerAlloc:{},bonusAlloc:{},profSkills:[],maxCulturalPoints:100,maxCareerPoints:100,maxBonusPoints:150,// Equipment
equipment:[],// Magic
magicAbilities:[],maxMagicPoints:0,// Cult
cultMemberships:[]},updateCharacter:updates=>set(state=>({character:{...state.character,...updates}}))}));
